tool_description: A simple and yet easy-to-use API for BBC News
name: BBC API
title: BBC API

api_list.name: news
api_list.description: Endpoint for getting news for one of the 30 supported languages.

api_list.name: status
api_list.description: The base endpoint for the API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bbc-api2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: latestNews
api_list.description: Endpoint for getting latest news for one of the 30 supported languages.

api_list.name: doc
api_list.description: The endpoint for the API's basic Documentation
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-api2.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
